description: Attention narrows to a single point, sharp and unwavering

generation.notes: Headspace is tunnel vision, world narrowing to a single point of attention. Key imagery: laser focus, everything else fading to static, reality shrinking. Elevates into submission when that singular focus is on controller - their voice becomes the only reality. Distinguishes from blank (focus is sharp attention, blank is no attention).

mantras.text: Distractions fade away into nothing for {subject}
{subject}'s mind zooms in, sharp and clear
{subject}'s awareness is a single, perfect point of light
{subject} is lost in the sound of {controller}'s voice
There is nothing but this moment, this focus for {subject}
{subject}'s mind is a lens, and {controller} directs the view
{subject} has no thoughts of their own, only focus
{subject}'s reality is defined by their point of focus
{subject}'s mind is permanently locked onto {controller}, nothing else will ever exist
